name: Espresso
description: A small, concentrated shot of coffee made by forcing hot water through finely ground, compacted coffee grounds. It's typically served in a small cup.

name: Double Espresso
description: Two shots of espresso in one serving, creating a more intense flavor and higher caffeine content.

name: Red Eye
description: A cup of drip coffee with a shot of espresso added, designed to give an extra caffeine boost.

name: Black Eye
description: Two shots of espresso added to a cup of drip coffee, resulting in an even stronger coffee flavor and higher caffeine content than a red eye.

name: Americano
description: A shot of espresso diluted with hot water, creating a similar strength and flavor to drip coffee.

name: Long Black
description: Similar to an Americano, but with the hot water added to the cup first and the espresso poured on top, creating a different taste profile.

name: Macchiato
description: A shot of espresso with a small amount of milk or foam added on top.

name: Long Macchiato
description: Similar to a macchiato, but with a double shot of espresso.

name: Cortado
description: A shot of espresso with a small amount of warm, textured milk added to cut the bitterness of the espresso.

name: Breve
description: Similar to a latte, but made with half-and-half instead of milk, resulting in a richer, creamier flavor.

name: Cappuccino
description: Equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and foam, often with a sprinkle of cocoa or cinnamon on top.

name: Flat White
description: Similar to a latte, but with less foam and a higher ratio of espresso to milk.

name: Cafe Latte
description: A shot of espresso with steamed milk and a small amount of foam added on top.

name: Mocha
description: A latte with added chocolate syrup or cocoa powder, creating a rich, chocolatey flavor.

name: Vienna
description: Similar to a mocha, but with whipped cream added on top.

name: Affogato
description: A scoop of vanilla ice cream or gelato "drowned" in a shot of hot espresso.

name: Cafe au Lait
description: A drink made with equal parts brewed coffee and steamed milk, often served in a large bowl or mug.

name: Iced Coffee
description: Chilled coffee served over ice, often with milk or sweetener added. It can be brewed hot and then chilled, or made using a cold brew method for a smoother flavor.
